name: One Eyed Wilson
description:
"One Eyed Wilson" is a Puzzle Platformer, where the player controls the one eyed alien Wilson.
Wilson can see only one color at a time.
The color changes depening what he is doing, like walking, standing still or jumping.
Every color reveals different things about the world, like walls or hovering platforms,
but ultimately everything is part of one single world,  even when Wilson cant see it at that moment.

Travel safe, Wilson!

Controls:

Arrowkeys / WASD:
- Move Left/Right
- Crouch
- Crouch Left/Right

Space:
-Jump

F:
-Attack (when a weapon has been collected)

This game was created for the GMTK Game Jam 2019!
